mapper.select: select rn, video_no videoNo, video_origin_name videoOriginName, to_char(video_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') videoDate, video_thumnail videoThumnail from (select ROWNUM rn, video_no, video_origin_name, video_date, video_thumnail from (select video_no, video_origin_name, video_date, video_thumnail from video where user_id=#{userId} and video_delete=0 order by video_no desc) o) t where rn > #{startRnum} and rn <= #{endRnum}

select rn, post_no postNo, writer_id writerId, post_title postTitle, to_char(cmt_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI') cmtDate from (select ROWNUM rn, post_no, writer_id, post_title, cmt_date from (select co.post_no, po.writer_id, po.post_title, cmt_date from comments co, post po where co.post_no=po.post_no and co.user_id=#{userId} order by post_no desc) o) t where rn > #{startRnum} and rn <= #{endRnum}

select rn, post_no postNo, post_title postTitle, post_soi_cnt postSoiCnt, post_cmt_cnt postCmtCnt, post_hit_cnt postHitCnt, to_char(post_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI') postDate, video_thumnail videoThumnail from (select ROWNUM rn, post_no, post_title, post_soi_cnt, post_cmt_cnt, post_hit_cnt, post_date, video_thumnail from (select post_no, post_title, post_soi_cnt, post_cmt_cnt, post_hit_cnt, post_date, vi.video_thumnail from post po, video vi where po.video_no=vi.video_no and writer_id=#{userId} order by post_no desc) o) t where rn > #{startRnum} and rn <= #{endRnum}

select rn, post_no postNo, post_title postTitle, post_soi_cnt postSoiCnt, post_cmt_cnt postCmtCnt, post_hit_cnt postHitCnt, to_char(post_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI') postDate, video_thumnail videoThumnail from (select ROWNUM rn, post_no, post_title, post_soi_cnt, post_cmt_cnt, post_hit_cnt, post_date, video_thumnail from (select sc.post_no, post_title, post_soi_cnt, post_cmt_cnt, post_hit_cnt, post_date, vi.video_thumnail from scrap sc, post po, video vi where sc.post_no=po.post_no and po.video_no=vi.video_no and sc.user_id=#{userId} order by post_no desc) o) t where rn > #{startRnum} and rn <= #{endRnum}

select user_id userId, user_name userName, user_email userEmail, user_addr userAddr, user_tel userTel, user_pwd userPwd, user_nickname userNickname, user_level userLevel, reg_date regDate from users where user_nickname != #{userNickname} and user_nickname = #{userNicknameAfter}

select video_no videoNo, user_id userId, video_origin_name videoOriginName, video_save_name videoSaveName, video_ex_name videoExName, video_path videoPath, video_size videoSize, to_char(video_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') videoDate, video_thumnail videoThumnail, video_correct_line videoCorrectLine from video where video_no=#{videoNo}
